BATTERIES ARE DISCONNECTED AND TAPED BACK AND ARE PROPERLY SECURED TO PREVENT MOVEMENT IN ANY DIRECTION. NO UNDECLARED HAZARDOUS MATERIALS ARE CONTAINERIZED, SECURED, OR STOWED IN THIS VEHICLE. WITH THE ABOVE STATEMENT, THESE VEHICLES ARE CLASSIFIED AS NON-HAZARDOUS.

Signed __________________
